name: Mini Island Challenge Bundle
summary: Choose your character, gather power-ups, and beat the bosses! Run through the four worlds and face the threat - run, shoot, dodge! Explore the four islands, each with a unique theme, and beat their challenges. Casual-friendly mechanics, straight forward gameplay, and the unique art style make the perfect, easy-to-grab entertainment. No time to waste - choose your arsenal, build your character with power-ups, and beat the Mini Island Challenge Bundle!
